program.name: Job Ready Indy: Employability Skills
program.description: Foundational employability skills curriculum developed by EmployIndy, Indianapolis Mayor's Office, and Indy Chamber. Earn 6 badges covering 30 core soft skills needed for any career. Required prerequisite for all Elevate For Humanity programs.

ai_instructors.name: Elizabeth L. Greene (AI)
ai_instructors.title: Career Readiness Coach
ai_instructors.bio: AI coach guiding students through Job Ready Indy employability skills, helping build confidence and professional readiness for any career path.

modules.title: JRI Program Orientation
modules.implementation_notes: Introduction to Job Ready Indy, overview of 6 badges, how to navigate the platform, and why employability skills matter for career success.

modules.title: Badge 1: Self-Awareness & Professional Identity
modules.implementation_notes: Complete Badge 1 on JRI platform. Skills covered: Understanding personal strengths, professional identity, workplace values, self-reflection. Upload badge certificate to EFH portal.

modules.title: Badge 2: Communication & Interpersonal Skills
modules.implementation_notes: Complete Badge 2 on JRI platform. Skills covered: Effective communication, active listening, professional email, workplace conversations, conflict resolution. Upload badge certificate.

modules.title: Badge 3: Critical Thinking & Problem Solving
modules.implementation_notes: Complete Badge 3 on JRI platform. Skills covered: Analytical thinking, decision-making, creative problem solving, workplace scenarios, resourcefulness. Upload badge certificate.

modules.title: Badge 4: Teamwork & Collaboration
modules.implementation_notes: Complete Badge 4 on JRI platform. Skills covered: Working in teams, collaboration, respecting diversity, group dynamics, contributing effectively. Upload badge certificate.

modules.title: Badge 5: Professionalism & Work Ethic
modules.implementation_notes: Complete Badge 5 on JRI platform. Skills covered: Punctuality, reliability, accountability, workplace ethics, professional appearance, time management. Upload badge certificate.

modules.title: Badge 6: Career Management & Goal Setting
modules.implementation_notes: Complete Badge 6 on JRI platform. Skills covered: SMART goals, career planning, networking, resume building, job search strategies, professional development. Upload badge certificate.

modules.title: JRI Completion & Career Readiness Portfolio
modules.implementation_notes: Review all 6 badges earned, compile career readiness portfolio (resume, network map, SMART goals), prepare for next program. EFH issues JRI Completion Certificate.

metadata.developed_by: Indianapolis Mayor's Office, EmployIndy, Indy Chamber
